msg.msgText: Unable to create a producer because the topic is a system topic: ConnectionID={0} ClientID={1} Protocol={2} Endpoint={3}.

msgExplanation.p: A message producer could not be created because the topic name starts with $SYS which is reserved for topics created by Message Gateway. In MQTT topic names starting with $ are reserved for system topicc. This log entry is shown only once per connection.

msgUserResponse.p: Do not use a topic name starting with $SYS as these are reserved for use by Message Gateway.
